root.title: feder home mortag bui fund lender
root.body: feder home mortgag corp announc sale 400 mln dlr residenti mortgag first union corp mortgag subsidiari freddi mac sai first union mortgag corp alreadi swap 70 mln dlr new residenti mortgag freddi mac first phase contract freddi mac sai bui sell 400 mln dlr worth mortag make mortgag monei avail sai guarantor program first union will allow convert invest qualiti mortgag mortgag back secur accept capit market freddi mac explain secur us collater borrow sell investor emploi varieti cash manag techniqu
